sentences.english: Ibsen displayed this simple reasoning to everyone over a hundred years ago.
sentences.chinese: 易卜生在一百多年前就向大家展現了這個簡單的道理。

sentences.english: Teichoscopia and claustrophobia are two techniques employed by Henrik Ibsen in his dramatic works.
sentences.chinese: 透牆而視與恐狹效應是易卜生戲劇的兩大技巧。

sentences.english: Read Ibsen and Dickens before bedtime.
sentences.chinese: 睡前讀讀易卜生和狄更斯。
